project.name: C-C476F-SUBV-09-ST03-DT05-DF13-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C476F-SUBV-09-ST03-DT05-DF13-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Good inputs: 1) environment variable contains any number <= 511,2) Environment variable contains string that is not a number Bad input: 1) environment variable not set 2) environment variable contains any number >= 512

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="20" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
